original_title: Donde Había la Pureza Implacable del Olvido
overview: A musician and composer who grew up in Tacuarembó, Eduardo Darnauchans, was one of the main creators of popular music in Uruguay. He was persecuted for political reasons from 1962 to 1984, and this documentary covers his life and work as a reflection of that troubled time.
title: The Implacable Purity of Oblivion
